title: How to write a novel - Book Store - Quora

response.answer_text: Find what works for you. I know that isn’t a very elaborate answer but it’s really important that instead of trying to follow guidelines and do things in a systematic way, you focus on developing the story in a way that allows you to be your most creative, passionate self and grow as a writer. Plotting out the story and coming up with an outline beforehand can work for some writers but I find that it can actually cause me to become sidetracked to stress over every little detail, rather than free-writing and letting the ideas come naturally. I hope this helped and good luck with your novel(s). Providing feedback to others helps me too so feel free to reach out to me if you need any more help or have any more questions.

Before you start writing : a good writer should be a good reader . Reading will help you to understand how to create a good novel . You can read books , articles and much more about it. Some books about writing are bird by bird, elements of style ,etc. So here the first thing you should do is read , read and read . Gather knowledge.The writing phase : So, you know a lot about writing . What makes up a good novel . Now , write the book . Set the plot. Create amazing characters and blow your reader's minds .Publish : so you are done . Now, get a publisher and get it published so that you can see your novel in your reader's hand .
